title: Behind The Scenes with 100 Words - BONUS EPISODE
itunes:title: Behind The Scenes with 100 Words - BONUS EPISODE
description:
Surprise! I wanted to toss this out here as a bonus episode for those of you who are interested in some of the behind the scenes stuff that happens with 100 Words, how the interviews are conducted and the amount of work it takes to pull these things together. My producer and I speak about some of our favorite moments in the previous episodes and other funny anecdotes. Thanks again for your support and continued listening! Please Support the Show and Donate Here!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
